reviews.review_msg: A fantastic prof who really cares about his students.
Coolest guy I know Would recommend 10/10 Beeve������
Coolest guy I know Would recommend 10/10
no exams, no tests, the class is literally tooo easy

First week he was friendly and polite, then he started being rude to the class,constantly makes the atmosphere uncomfortable. He has strict rules of people being late and assignment deadlines, but he never handed back marked assignments on time. He give really short notices on canceling classes(often too). This teacher is a GPA dragger, stay away.

He is very moody and he is always conflicted with his emotions. He can be super understanding and they be very mean in a hurry. Aside from that, he takes his time explaining concepts. The ideal student would need to do well academically as well as get to know him very well.
